meanings.definition: A twelfth part, especially of one (1/12).
meanings.sent1: She cut the cake into dozenths to share with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for a dozenths of a cup of sugar.
meanings.sent3: The tiny elf measured everything in dozenths, even her tiny shoes.
meanings.sent4: His heart beat in dozenths, each pulse a fraction of the whole.
meanings.sent5: The dozenths of the puzzle piece fit perfectly into place.

meanings.sent1: There were dozenths of stars twinkling in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested dozenths of apples from his orchard.
meanings.sent3: The clown car was filled with dozenths of clowns, much to the audience's delight.
meanings.sent4: The library contained dozenths of books, each waiting to be read.
meanings.sent5: The field was covered in dozenths of colorful flowers, a sight to behold.
